Headline: #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop
ShortDescription: NB 22 Clark, 151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute near 47th/ Wallace
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 47th/ Wallace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 47th/ Wallace.

Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Halsted, 51st, Wentworth and 47th.

Westbound  buses will operate via 47th,Wells, 51st, Halsted and 47th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at UIC-Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at UIC-Halsted. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
